project.description: 巡检基础镜像制作问题，并发邮件。

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: buildnumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Main-xxx-build任务的job号 注意：若不填写，程序默认取最后一次job号。

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e if [[ "x${branch}" == "x" ]];then echo "分支不能为空！" exit 1 fi
if [[ "x${to_addr}" == "x" ]];then echo "收件人不能为空！" exit 1 fi
sudo su - root<<FEOF ( cat <<EOF [general] apiurl=http://117.78.1.88 no_verify=yes [http://117.78.1.88] user=${OBS_USER} pass=${OBS_PWD} EOF ) > ~/.oscrc
( cat <<EOF2 [sp1] name=sp1 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP1/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[sp1-epol] name=sp1-epol baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP1:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[sp3] name=sp3 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP3/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[sp3-epol] name=sp3-epol baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP3:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[2203-LTS] name=2203-LTS baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[2203-LTS-epol] name=2203-LTS-epol baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[2203-LTS-Next] name=2203-LTS-Next baseurl=http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next/standard_aarch64/ enabled=0 gpgcheck=0
[2203-LTS-Next-epol] name=2203-LTS-Next-epol baseurl=http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=0 gpgcheck=0
[Mainline] name=Mainline baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Mainline/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[epol] name=epol baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 EOF2 ) > /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo
git config --global user.email "80474298@qq.com" git config --global user.name "openeuler-ci-bot" git config --global pull.ff only
rm -rf openeuler-os-build for ((i=1;i<=5;i++)); do if [ ! -d openeuler-os-build ];then git clone --depth 1 https://gitee.com/wangchong1995924/openeuler-os-build #git clone --depth 1 https://${giteeuser}:${giteepwd}@gitee.com/openeuler/openeuler-os-build else break fi done
cd openeuler-os-build/script/tools/ if [ -z ${buildnumber} ];then python3 iso_result_report.py -u "${jenkins_user}" -w "${jenkins_pwd}" -su ${email_user} -sw ${email_pwd} -tu ${to_addr} -b ${branch} else python3 iso_result_report.py -u "${jenkins_user}" -w "${jenkins_pwd}" -su ${email_user} -sw ${email_pwd} -tu ${to_addr} -b ${branch} -num ${buildnumber} fi FEOF
